subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks revealed that Kristaps Porzingis, their No. 1 pick in the 2015 N.B.A., had injured his left knee Wednesday night in a noncontact drill.
snippet: The Knicks revealed that Kristaps Porzingis, their No. 1 pick in the 2015 N.B.A., had injured his left knee Wednesday night in a noncontact drill.
